messages.message: Hi, are the components in `instabase.utils.email` suitable for use from within solutions to send custom notifications?

You should not. That’s our internal libraries, and not designed as a public facing library. We change the code up in our libraries very freely so there will be no compatibility guarantee for any solution dependencies. You borrow ideas from it, and you can build a dev-exchange package, which ou can then version and use in your solutions. One might already exist, you should check with solution-eng to check.

Hi @Heymian, thanks. There is no such existing package in sol eng so we need to create this (a client will need  this). in terms of underlying infra (smtp server/port) - will this need to be separate for solution-level code?
yeah the values for the server/port will need to be taken in as input because they’re going to be different in different environments/clients?
